title: PBE Error 500
body: So I've been trying to check my pbe status but it keeps taking forever to load and then ends up saying Error: 500. I've tried it on 3 different devices, with VPN, and on different browsers but nothing seems to work. Please help me figure this out

replies.body: this is happening to me as well. I've tried contacting support via Twitter and a Ticket but they tell me to use VPN or a different browser. Yet, it still doesn't fix the issue

Relatable.
Might have something to do with the accounts, tried on like 5 devices without luck.

There's been a few reports on this, and we'd like to look into this more through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Hit us up so we can gather more info on this.  We'll reply back asap!
